reviews.sentence: A Good Business Hotel near Hinjewadi. A purely business hotel I visited Ginger Wakad in the 2nd Week of March for a single nights stay. Located on the Pune Bangalore Highway Ginger at this location is ideal for those who have work in around Hinjewadi Aundh etc. Being alone they provided me a Double Bed AC Room which was extremely comfortable for the night. The added advantage for people visiting at this hotel is the Free WIFI which they provide for whoever is staying at here. The WIFI keeps getting disconnected after sometime switch the WIFI on off for it to resumeI did not have a chance to have breakfast in the morning since I had to leave early so can not comment on it. Overall a good decent stay for people coming to Pune for business.

Budget Hotel for a Short Stay. I was to arrive early morning at Chinchwad and needed a place to to change and freshen up before leaving for business and return at the end of the day and check out to board a bus back. As I was expected to arrive early in the day 730 am and with a standard 12 pm check in time I was not sure if any hotel would accommodate a very early check in but I hoped it would and booked for the night I was arriving. I checked up many hotels and for the reason that it was very near to my point of alighting boarding my bus i preferred it over the other very good budget hotel I had stayed in earlier Keys Hotel. The front desk employees were quite courteous and I was allowed to check in as soon as I arrived at about 8 am. Also the breakfast for that day was covered under the booking even though technically I was eligible for the breakfast the next morning. The room was decent though the connecting door to a joint room had a dysfunctional door latch. The bathroom was not quite up to standards in terms of its cleanliness there were water stains on the faucets and the toilet was not really sparkling. The photos attached will show this. I was expecting a higher standard this being a Tata company. Breakfast options were not extravagant but had sufficient variety and I had no complaints there. Overall I was happy with this stay since it met my purpose.

Food was good service was quick. The bad thing is Wi Fi did not work properly during the stay due to poor router the thing impressed was daily the chef used to cut fruits given by us nicely for dinner. This hotel is good to stay and can be recommended for others.

Great place great service. I stayed here for 3 months. The overall experience has been great. The restaurant staff are very courteous. specially to mention a few names like Suhas restaurant manager sandesh naludas and the chef zaher. Rooms can be maintained a little better and wifi needs to be improved. Will miss these pl for sure. Would recommend u if u want to travel from pune to lonavala or mumbai by road. After a stopover here. Coz the expressway is just a stones throw away. Overall experience was fantastico. Adios amigos.

Terribly Maintained. Bed Linen Turned Yellow No Garbage Bags in the Trash Can A noisy AC Water not hot enough. Mini Dosas served during breakfast were cold. Need not say more BTW WiFI was intermitentWil be visiting again. Hopefully it was a one time ocurence.

Not much good stay. Very small room service is not good also they are charging extra on breakfast. This hotel is good for business traveler not for family traveler. This is average hotels. My family is not happy. This hotel is good for small stay long stay is horrible.
Restaurant food is awesome but room service of food is not good at all. Hotel staff behaviour is very familiar.

Nicely located hotel. We stayed on our way to Mumbai. the location is nice outside the busy streets and close to the National highway. finding restaurants for sining nearby is a bit difficult. overall it was a nice experience value for money.

Much inferior to any other Ginger hotel. After staying in many Ginger hotels like Chandigarh Mumbai Delhi Jaipur with satisfactory exeriences the stay in Ginger Wakad. Pune was full of inconvinence due to folwing experiences1 The Travel Desk person is not genuine. We wanted a Cab to Mahableshwar and when we enquired him he told us the rates as RS 300 all inclusive. A day before cheking in we called to confirm the rates the person told us the rate as 350. After Checking in on the eve before our trip the Travel desk person raised the rates to 400 and responded rudely We were to cancel the trip though Swati from reception came to rescue administration had a detailed call with her and agreed for a 360 amount to which we finally agreed. To be honest after the Driver provide was good 2. Kettle was broken and very dirty in rom3. TV size is the smallest one could ever have4. Bathroom did not have a proper wall mounted shower5. Common area washroom is very dirty the is the dirtiest room one could ever have6. I had my guest visited on eve and decided to take them to hotel restaurant but was embarrassed to see the couches were torn off and menu provided was also torn out The Sofa even moved forward on sitting on it No 3 star hotel could possible have torn out sofas 7. Wifi is a big joke you can not even connect google map on it the slowest a wifi connection can be Every time I had to see the map used to connect to my data card on roaming8. Room Size is extremely smal9. Resturant staff apart from one dressed in blue there are 2 waiters dressed in black who seemed to be localite were extremely rude at one of the instance we asked the waiters what s there in ready to order menu they told “ Jo hai wo ye hi hai ”. then we told him that its there in Menu for dosa and egg to order … so will like a dosa … they said “ time lagega”. Whenever we asked something they used to state at us and rudely and take a lot of time even for getting tea which was having a counter right in front Hopeles service10 We have been confirmed booking with rates mention in a crystal clear way in mail send to us for Double Occupancy room. at the time of check out when we asked for invoice found the tarif rates were increased that those mention in mails … when we ask they told its extra charges for double occupancy the we showed them with clearly mention separate rates for single and double occupancy and we being charged for double occupancy …. then they told the rates have changed while we enquiring politely with a sikh person and one with specks on reception another localite standing at reception interrupted and started talking rudely in regional language … saying rates have been changed now …. in the end they went inside might have checked their records and agreed to rates mailed to us.

Good hotel value for money. Hotel is good in general other than the food. Facilities like internet cleanliness is all OK can be improved Fod at the restraint is outsourced dishes are too greasy. Position of AC in the room is not practical as either it is blasts the air directly on you or it gets too hot when switched off had to keep a chair in front of the vent.

Comfortable and reasonably priced. The amenities at Ginger wakad are basic and functional but the staff is super courteous and they do their best to make your stay comfortable. I was there for 4 days on a business trip. The room was pretty small but comfy. There was a small gymnasium which I utilized. The buffet breakfast had enough variety and it had fresh juices. Overall this is value for money. I had recommend it to budget and business travelers.
Pleasant place to stay. Highly recommended. Restaurant food is awesome.
decent hotel at the highway breakfast is godgod experience.

Good breakfast with live counter variety food. Small yet good room nice service and facilities very good breakfast. Great concept. Cooperative staff with good manners. Dinner buffet concept is new and nice. Overall very good experience in economy rate.

Good location and connectivity. Location is very good with good connectivity complimentary breakfast good room is very clean good facilities in the room improvements required in service and Wi Fi service overall experience is good with value for money.

The hotel infrastructure is a bit old but is well maintained and is spick and span. Plenty of food items are available in room service with both alacarte and buffet meals. ATM is located in campus. Parking for visitors is free. The staff were courteous and helpful. Enjoyed my stay.

Feedback. While traveling on Mumbai Pune express way we along with family found Ginger a good place to have dinner and breakfast. On occasion restaurant staff members service was quite enthusiastic and perfect especially from Mayur Akshay Mr Kuldep and Mr Suhas served us stuff. Menu was delicious while all these members were very cordial and courtesious to us. Thanks and good luck.

Restaurant. We went for lunch at the hotel and we were attended by Mr Mayur. we opted for buffet which included starters and main course along with desert. The hospitality was very good and food was yummiest. I would definitely recommend to visit this hotel and especially have food. it is really very very tasty.
Pleasant stay. We had a pleasant stay the restraint serves decent food and was accommodating of the fact that we had toddler travelling with us.
